com.github.gwtd3.api.svg

Class RadialLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.github.gwtd3.api.svg.PathDataGenerator
        • com.github.gwtd3.api.svg.Line
          • com.github.gwtd3.api.svg.RadialLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsFunction

    public class RadialLine
extends Line
    A line generator where each points may be expressed as radial coordinates.

    Author:
    Anthony Schiochet

    • Method Detail

      • radius

        public final RadialLine radius(double d)
        Set the radius coordinates of points generated by this generator.
        Parameters:
        d - the radius
        Returns:
        the current line

      • radius

        public final RadialLine radius(DatumFunction<Double> callback)
        Set the function used to compute radius coordinates of points generated by this line generator. The function is invoked for each element in the data array passed to the line generator.

        The default accessor assumes that each input element is a two-element array of numbers.

        Parameters:
        datumFunction -
        Returns:
        the current line

      • angle

        public final RadialLine angle(double d)
        Set the angle coordinates of points generated by this generator.
        Parameters:
        d - the angle
        Returns:
        the current line

      • angle

        public final RadialLine angle(DatumFunction<Double> callback)
        Set the function used to compute angle coordinates of points generated by this line generator. The function is invoked for each element in the data array passed to the line generator.

        The default accessor assumes that each input element is a two-element array of numbers.

        Parameters:
        datumFunction -
        Returns:
        the current line
